summary: es un ENB sencillo pero muy buenos efectos
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://farm3.staticflickr.com/2811/9619034700_36f9cd72cd_o.png[/img]
[/center]
[size=18][color=#FF0000][center]description[/center][/color][/size]

[b]This is a compilation of different ENB, I know there are very good ENB settings here on Nexus, but for me there were many who were very bright so I started to modify some files of different versions, and well this is my small contribution to this great community.

I should clarify that I\'m using more than 125 mods some of them are HD textures, so I have the game on ultra and run the game 35-50 depending on the area, with a resolution of 1600x900 with 16 anisotropic filtering.[/b]


[size=18][color=#FF0000][center]Requirements[/center][/color][/size]
That need the d3d9.dll file is available in [url=http://www.enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.htm]http://www.enbdev.com/index_en.htm[/url]
Compatible with version 0.193 on, 0.221 recommended.

[size=18][color=#FF0000][center]Recommendations[/center][/color][/size]
[color=#0000FF][b]For those who want to try this version I suggest you first make a backup of your current eNBs, if you do not like my contribution to return to overwrite previous versions.[/color][/b]
[size=18][color=#FF0000][center]Imagery[/center][/color][/size]
Forgive me for putting so many pictures in gif but it is to have a reference that changing quite the visual in Skyrim, please wait upload the images to see the results.
[center][img]http://farm3.staticflickr.com/2878/9619010568_2ef69b8baa_o.png[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://farm3.staticflickr.com/2845/9618995968_49a9d36e9b_o.png[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://farm4.staticflickr.com/3676/9615742075_8b84a87f34_o.png[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7341/9618974484_d4f1c6409e_o.png[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://farm3.staticflickr.com/2875/9615718813_54652fa78a_o.png[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7356/9615726627_f82ec342dc_o.png[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7325/9618965254_9663a1e1f6_o.png[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://farm6.staticflickr.com/5329/9618957814_7b565e54f5_o.png[/img][/center]

[size=18][color=#FF0000][center]Changes[/center][/color][/size]
version 4
I modified all files
The night is a little clearer
The fire is more realistic
Daylight is clearer without discoloring the world
sweetfx file is added (optional)

Version 3
The colors are more intense now
Changed file stars (in the video perhaps notice)
I changed some parameters of the Depth of Field.
I changed the intensity of the shadows

version 2
It has increased the ambient light and the brightness down a bit in some places was too.
I modified the sun and sunshine, with ENB settings the sun seems to have life in SKYRIM, change schedules tones of dawn, day, dusk
author: sjtecnico

files.name: ENB regular color II
files.changelogHtml:
It has grown a little ambient light and reduced excessive brightness that was in certain parts of the game.
Changed the sun and glare with ENB settings the sun has an effect that is alive and can be noticed if you look right.

The fire is more realistic
